## üìù App Details

### Name
```
Scores
```

### Summary
```
View and play MusicXML scores
```

### Description
```
Display and play MusicXML and related music notation formats inside Nextcloud using OpenSheetMusicDisplay.

Features:
- üéº Sheet Music Display: Render MusicXML, compressed MusicXML (.mxl), and other formats
- ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Advanced Playback: Play, pause, stop, and loop with real-time cursor tracking
- üéöÔ∏è Instrument Mixer: Individual volume control for each instrument/channel
- üéµ Tempo & Volume Control: Precise BPM adjustment (40-240) and master volume
- üìä Progress Tracking: Visual progress bar with time and measure indicators
- ‚å®Ô∏è Keyboard Shortcuts: Space (play/pause), arrows (navigate), +/- (zoom)
- üîç Smart Search: Real-time search across all scores and folders
- üì± Responsive Design: Adaptive layout with collapsible sidebar
```

```
- Multimedia
- Tools
```

## üöÄ Submission Steps

1. **Register Account:**
   - Go to: https://apps.nextcloud.com/developer/register
   - Create developer account with email: micheledimeo@gmail.com

2. **Register App:**
   - Go to: https://apps.nextcloud.com/developer/apps/new
   - Fill in:
     - App ID: `mxmlscores`
     - Certificate: (paste the X.509 certificate above)
     - App ID Signature: (paste the signature above)

3. **Upload First Release:**
   - After app is registered, go to releases section
   - Add new release v0.9.5
   - Fill in:
     - Download URL: (GitHub release URL above)
     - Archive Signature: (paste archive signature above)
     - Nightly: No

4. **Wait for Review:**
   - Nextcloud team will review the app
   - Estimated time: 1-2 weeks
   - You'll receive email updates
